name: aegean
description:
The AEGeAn Toolkit is designed for the Analysis and Evaluation of Genome
Annotations. The toolkit includes a variety of analysis programs as well
as a C library whose API provides access to AEGeAn's core functions and
data structures.

dependencies.name: genometools
dependencies.description:
genometools is a free collection of bioinformatics tools (in the realm
of genome informatics) combined into a single binary named gt.
